.. APBS-PDB2PQR documentation master file

APBS-PDB2PQR
============

APBS (Adaptive Poisson-Boltzmann Solver) and PDB2PQR are software packages designed to analyze the solvation properties of small molecules as well as macro-molecules such as proteins, nucleic acids, and other complex systems.
This is the documentation for these packages; more information can be found at the `APBS-PDB2PQR homepage <http://www.poissonboltzmann.org>`_.
